channel.title: Robot Framework Puppeteer | Easy, Stable and Speed web testing
channel.description: Recent content on Robot Framework Puppeteer | Easy, Stable and Speed web testing

item.title: Alert Handler Feature
item.description: RF Puppeteer allow to handle browser alert using Handle Alert keyword. Example: Handle alert by accept / dismiss Use Handle Alert keyword with option ACCEPT or DISMISS

item.title: Async Await Feature
item.description: RF Puppeteer allow to interact with UI Element using Run Async Keywords keyword. Run Async Keywords allow to combine multiple synchronous keywords and run all keywords at the same time (asynchronous). Example: Login with valid password will redirect to login welcome page. Run Async Keywords on line 11 that cover keywords line 12 - 13. This will make keyword Wait For New Window Open and Click Element run as asynchronous.

item.title: Browser Management Feature
item.description: Open/Close browser and handle new page RF Puppeteer allow you to open / close browser with following keywords Open browser Close Browser Close All Browser Close Puppeteer Switch Window Wait For New Window Open Example: Line 9 - 11: Wait For New Window Open wait until new window open during click the button for open a new tab. Line 12: Switch Window switch to NEW open window Line 14: Switch Window switch to existing window by window title

item.title: Debug Mode Feature
item.description: RF Puppeteer can enable debug mode for easier when develop new test script by Enable Debug Mode keywords Example: Run keyword Enable Debug Mode will Open developer tools Run test with slow motion mode

item.title: Element Property Feature
item.description: Element properties Enable / Disable Visible / Hide Text

item.title: Form Handler Feature
item.description: Form submit RF Puppeteer allow you to simple interact with html forms with following keywords: Input Text Click Element Click Button Click Image Click Link Example: Select dropdown item Select value from dropdown list need to use folling keywords: Select From List By Label Select From List By Value Example:
